name: Cell class-specific electric field entrainment of neural activity
citation: Anastassiou, Costas (2024) Cell class-specific electric field entrainment of neural activity (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/000965/draft
description: This is the in vitro data set presented in the publication Lee et al. "Cell class-specific electric field entrainment of neural activity", Neuron (2024). It comprises of single-neuron patch-clamp recordings performed in the presence of extracellular sinusoidal stimulation and simultaneous extracellular recordings. The methods and codes for analyzing this data set are located in https://github.com/anastassiou-team/celltype_brainstim_invitro
